event.descr:
Generated when a probe failure is detected when the corresponding pingCtlTrapGeneration object is set to probeFailure(0) subject to the value of pingCtlTrapProbeFailureFilter. The object pingCtlTrapProbeFailureFilter can be used to specify the number of successive probe failures that are required before this notification can be generated.

pingCtlTargetAddressType %parm[#1]%;

unknown(0) ipv4(1) ipv6(2) ipv4z(3) ipv6z(4) dns(16)

pingCtlTargetAddress %parm[#2]%;

pingResultsOperStatus %parm[#3]%;

enabled(1) disabled(2)

pingResultsIpTargetAddressType %parm[#4]%;

unknown(0) ipv4(1) ipv6(2) ipv4z(3) ipv6z(4) dns(16)

pingResultsIpTargetAddress %parm[#5]%;

pingResultsMinRtt %parm[#6]%;

pingResultsMaxRtt %parm[#7]%;

pingResultsAverageRtt %parm[#8]%;

pingResultsProbeResponses %parm[#9]%;

pingResultsSentProbes %parm[#10]%;

pingResultsRttSumOfSquares %parm[#11]%;

pingResultsLastGoodProbe %parm[#12]%;
event.logmsg: pingProbeFailed trap received pingCtlTargetAddressType=%parm[#1]% pingCtlTargetAddress=%parm[#2]% pingResultsOperStatus=%parm[#3]% pingResultsIpTargetAddressType=%parm[#4]% pingResultsIpTargetAddress=%parm[#5]% pingResultsMinRtt=%parm[#6]% pingResultsMaxRtt=%parm[#7]% pingResultsAverageRtt=%parm[#8]% pingResultsProbeResponses=%parm[#9]% pingResultsSentProbes=%parm[#10]% pingResultsRttSumOfSquares=%parm[#11]% pingResultsLastGoodProbe=%parm[#12]%

event.descr:
Generated when a ping test is determined to have failed when the corresponding pingCtlTrapGeneration object is set to testFailure(1). In this instance pingCtlTrapTestFailureFilter should specify the number of probes in a test required to have failed in order to consider the test as failed.

pingCtlTargetAddressType %parm[#1]%;

unknown(0) ipv4(1) ipv6(2) ipv4z(3) ipv6z(4) dns(16)

pingCtlTargetAddress %parm[#2]%;

pingResultsOperStatus %parm[#3]%;

enabled(1) disabled(2)

pingResultsIpTargetAddressType %parm[#4]%;

unknown(0) ipv4(1) ipv6(2) ipv4z(3) ipv6z(4) dns(16)

pingResultsIpTargetAddress %parm[#5]%;

pingResultsMinRtt %parm[#6]%;

pingResultsMaxRtt %parm[#7]%;

pingResultsAverageRtt %parm[#8]%;

pingResultsProbeResponses %parm[#9]%;

pingResultsSentProbes %parm[#10]%;

pingResultsRttSumOfSquares %parm[#11]%;

pingResultsLastGoodProbe %parm[#12]%;
event.logmsg: pingTestFailed trap received pingCtlTargetAddressType=%parm[#1]% pingCtlTargetAddress=%parm[#2]% pingResultsOperStatus=%parm[#3]% pingResultsIpTargetAddressType=%parm[#4]% pingResultsIpTargetAddress=%parm[#5]% pingResultsMinRtt=%parm[#6]% pingResultsMaxRtt=%parm[#7]% pingResultsAverageRtt=%parm[#8]% pingResultsProbeResponses=%parm[#9]% pingResultsSentProbes=%parm[#10]% pingResultsRttSumOfSquares=%parm[#11]% pingResultsLastGoodProbe=%parm[#12]%

event.descr:
Generated at the completion of a ping test when the corresponding pingCtlTrapGeneration object is set to testCompletion(4).

pingCtlTargetAddressType %parm[#1]%;

unknown(0) ipv4(1) ipv6(2) ipv4z(3) ipv6z(4) dns(16)

enabled(1) disabled(2)

pingResultsMaxRtt %parm[#7]%;

pingResultsAverageRtt %parm[#8]%;

pingResultsProbeResponses %parm[#9]%;

pingResultsSentProbes %parm[#10]%;

pingResultsRttSumOfSquares %parm[#11]%;

pingResultsLastGoodProbe %parm[#12]%;
event.logmsg: pingTestCompleted trap received pingCtlTargetAddressType=%parm[#1]% pingCtlTargetAddress=%parm[#2]% pingResultsOperStatus=%parm[#3]% pingResultsIpTargetAddressType=%parm[#4]% pingResultsIpTargetAddress=%parm[#5]% pingResultsMinRtt=%parm[#6]% pingResultsMaxRtt=%parm[#7]% pingResultsAverageRtt=%parm[#8]% pingResultsProbeResponses=%parm[#9]% pingResultsSentProbes=%parm[#10]% pingResultsRttSumOfSquares=%parm[#11]% pingResultsLastGoodProbe=%parm[#12]%
